title: Justin Bieber rips off bride Hailey’s garter with his teeth in new wedding photos
text:
The couple are smitten with each other (Picture: Calvin Klein)

Justin Bieber wasted no time in ripping Hailey Bieber’s garter off her leg with his teeth and we can’t look away.

The 25-year-old shared the racy wedding photos with his wife on Instagram and fans freaked out.

Justin simply captioned the photo: ‘Yeeee’.

Yeeee indeed, Justin.

Hailey and Justin got married (again) last week in South Carolina and have been sharing amazing pictures from the day.

The second snap, albeit less sexy, captured the happy in love couple enjoying their ceremony in an affectionate hug on the dance floor.

A smitten Hailey had her arms around the Boyfriend singer as they held on to each other.

The adorable snaps had left fans freaking out with happiness for the newlyweds.

One fan commented: ‘But you justin..this care is too much you gonna destroy her with too much love’ along with three heart-eye emojis.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘Ahh!! 2009 me is crying!! so happy for you,’ another fan commented.

We feel her pain.

Meanwhile, the moment we’ve all been waiting for is inching closer.

Justin has a new album on the way, it is not a drill.

Fans have been begging the Baby singer for new music since his last album, Purpose, dropped back in November 2015.

Seriously, how has it been that long?

But the 25-year-old has revealed we won’t be waiting too long for more music, as he’s planning to drop something by the end of the year.

Taking to Instagram, he shared a live video of himself Segway-ing around his house, with his 119million followers.

‘I’m putting out an album this year,’ he let slip, as wife Hailey Baldwin asked: ‘This year meaning before 2020?

‘I thought you already were doing it this year?’

He then added: ‘Album coming out this year … legit though, like this year.’

Well he’s only got a few more months to drop it… Justin hasn’t blessed us with a new album for four years, but has got in the studio for a string of collaborations, including I Don’t Care, with Ed Sheeran, Billie Eilish’s Bad Guy, and recently dropped 10,000 Hours with Dan + Shay.

Now we just need more!

description: Justin Bieber shared a snap of him sliding off Hailey Bieber's garters with his teeth during their wedding celebrations.
